reviews.title: Useless!
reviews.comment: Registration failed, so I go to the website for some info and its in some other language.

reviews.title: Love it but...
reviews.comment: When I turn on realtime protection this application was not responding or force close.please fixed this application..i\'m using samsung galaxy young
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Crashed once. Couldn\'t find any test files. Why do they need my phone number? Scanner looks solid. I need something I can trust and this ain\'t it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Performance
reviews.comment: This antivirus is good . Run fast , don\'t take too much resource of the phone .
